meanings.definition: Come near or nearer to (someone or something) in distance or time.
meanings.sent1: I slowly approach the cat to pet it.
meanings.sent2: The train will approach the station soon.
meanings.sent3: As I approach the finish line, I realize I forgot to tie my shoelaces!
meanings.sent4: The deadline approaches like a storm on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The sound of footsteps approaching made me nervous.

meanings.definition: A way of dealing with something.
meanings.sent1: My approach to studying is to make colorful notes.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the best approach to the problem.
meanings.sent3: His approach to cooking involves adding chocolate to every dish.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to life is like a dance, full of grace and rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's approach to teaching math made it easy to understand.
